author: Ronald Roberson
comment: I really didn't start enjoying my Android Wear watch until I installed the Ranger watch face. First of all, it has a custom square face that fits my watch precisely. It truly is always on unlike most watch faces. In addition to the time in regular and 24 hour format, it provides not only the day and the date, but also the temperature, the weather, and the status of your watch or phone batteries. Other watch faces seem limited in comparison.

author: George Kuriakose
comment: (I should have read the short review by Mr. Austin before buying it.)  Its a beautiful watch face. Really nice looking and presents data perfectly.  But...  The compass and battery complications (while extremely useful and one of the reasons I bought it) will burn through battery like there's no tomorrow.  Disable these and you'll be fine.  But then, of course, your phone stock face will probably do the job equally well (with a much less "cool" quotient of course), for $1 less.  Buy it to show off/use, once in a while. Not for regular use.

author: Jenny Eldershaw
comment: Great watch face with an original and attractive night mode but it slurped my battery from full to 30% in 8 hours. Wish I hadn't bothered. Will not buy a watch face which doesn't have a free trial or free basic face again. It was cheap but it's money wasted. Shame. I would have given it 5 otherwise.

author: Andy Milkowski
comment: Best watch face I could find. I like the three complications shown and the grey/white night mode.  Most people don't know it is a smart watch.   I hope that Ranger can defeat the 2.0 problem of accidental screen modification.

author: Nick Potter
comment: A nice watch face and would have given it 5 starts but it lost one as to my mind the settings are too easy to accidentally change. I'm forever finding the watch had gone into settings mode and more than once I've accidentally changed what complications are shown just by the watch brushing against things. It might be an Android Wear issue too but adding the ability to lock down your configuration would help a lot.

author: Chris Carillo
comment: If the integration with Google Fit and weather were better, this would be one of the best watch faces. Doesn't seem to sync properly with Google Fit: steps & time seriously differ, don't sync consistently. Weather seems to be 5°-11° difference than Weather Bug and Google Weather.

author: Sid Promyotin
comment: This watchface is a massive battery drain on the latest Android Wear versions. Battery life is half what it used to be and drains far more than default OEM faces.

author: Azhan Jihadi
comment: Love the design. But wish there is more build in complication like heart rate, calories, etc. The 3rd party complications doesn't look as good with only single colour. Oh and I realized it drain battery faster then others

author: Steve Goddard
comment: Plenty of wonderful features but they count for nothing when it drains battery super fast. I left my watch in idle for six hours and lost 53% battery. I lost the remaining 47% within an hour when using it. I switched to the stock standard design that comes with my smart watch and my battery life is perfect.

author: K. Bentley
comment: It's okay.  Not great.  Looks pretty good, but is fairly power hungry.  You can fix this by dimming the various states, but this takes away from the face.  Maybe just my setup.  Really can't go wrong for a $1.  My AMOLED screen would prefer a "use fewer pixels" option of sorts to cut down power usage.  Perhaps something else is causing the heavy drain?

author: Mike Strollo
comment: Update: Developer has resolved the installing issue. Thank you  Won't install on watch with Android Wear 2.0. I can see it as an option for download on the watch after installing on my phone. Says "can't download" every time I try and install on the watch. I've uninstalled and reinstalled several times in the phone. No luck!

author: Scott McDonald
comment: EDIT: Nevermind. Seems the face reports solid battery life even when battery is dead or about to die. Grrrr....OLD REVIEW: Remarkable fix to battery issues on AW 2...Battery life is WAY BETTER than it was back on AW 1 now, great job! I've edited this review a few times, praise, then frustration with battery issues on AW 2 and now back to praise. Until quite recently (11/17 edit here) my 2nd gen Moto 360 with this face wouldn't make it through to even afternoon, let alone evening. A recent update though (not sure when it was) changed all of that and now I get to the end of TWO DAYS and still have 30% or so battery left. Really, remarkable fix guys. Thanks!

author: Herman Tsang
comment: I just reinstall thr watch face after reset ny watch.. but it seems the weather doesn't work. Nothing show there. How can I make it work then?

author: Jim Horstick
comment: Aesthetically the best watch face I have found, and packed with all the complications I need. Unfortunately, battery life is abysmal on my Nixon Mission. The watch barely makes it until 5pm with minimal use.

author: Steve Fournier
comment: Anyone with Android 2.0 must install the face from the watch, it no longer will automatically show up on the phone. Once you install from the play store, you should have a notification on the watch that will request another install to the watch.   Welcome to Android 2.0

author: Tray Herman
comment: Love it. This is probably my primary watch face love having it. My only regret is that I still cannot figure out how to put the trip indicator on.

author: Austin Aamodt
comment: Love the face, definitely a favorite.  Compass complication will chew through the battery life on a watch with GPS.  Don't use it and it's perfect.

author: Jonathan Boyd
comment: I love the face, looks great and doesn't seem to impact the battery. The weather doesn't work right (shows same Temps for high/low).

author: Joshua Murray
comment: New update fixed the weather issue.  Great job getting that out quickly.  This watch face is awesome, so informative at a glance.  Has everything you could want and is customizable.

author: J simino
comment: Downloaded can't remember how much I paid for this app. But it never migrated to my watch (Samsung gear s2). So it's essentially useless

author: Tim Burgess
comment: I really did like this watch face on my original Moto 360 however it died.  Motorola sent me a new watch but I can't get this watch face on it.  When I open the app it states that it is "installed on your wearable device" but it isn't there.

author: Lisa Andrew
comment: Battery drain terrible weather can't see like what's happening in the week and what I done with steps i very the week

author: Kevin Monroe
comment: It won't appear on my watch or communicate with it .99 isn't allot of money but one would expect it to work

author: Ray Marx
comment: Now if I just had control of the color choices and how to keep it from turning off!!!😵😡👾

author: Josef Shelp
comment: Was my #1 choice now the features once available are not and when I configure the watch face it is not available in Android wear.  Waste of a purchase which is getting worse with every download.  I've changed phones, uninstalled and reinstalled.  Poor application execution and administrative upkeep.  Would not reccomend to pay, save your money.

author: Javier Chang
comment: Very nice. I like the night mode being switchable. The compass only works at times. I would like to see an option for a digital clock. Using Moto 360 Update : It works nicely with Huawei Smartwatch 1st gen paired with Essential phone

author: J Casas
comment: If I use this face my battery lasts 10 hours if I switch to any other face with similar gadgets it lasts almost 48 hours........I love the design but the battery issue is a huge problem for me.

author: Andy Jones
comment: Why advertise distance on watchface? Bought it for that!! Don't buy if you need that as the is is not possible, false advertisement.

author: Ronnie Stacy
comment: Shows wrong date, wrong temp, can't change most settings. Msg; "Watch can't communicate with device." I want my $ back.

author: Ahmed Gewiley-Elbakly
comment: I have gotten countless compliments on this watch face. On my Huawei Watch, it really looks like a real watch, and people are always impressed. Highly recommended, definitely the best "classic" watch face out there.

author: John Kaufmann
comment: Looks great awesome features but the battery get DESTROYED with this face on

author: Abba Firaa
comment: Best watch app for my SW3. Amazing features and easy to customize. All info I need is right on my wrist with this app. Please hide the from apps list and integrate with android wear app. Also update often, please.

author: Mike C
comment: Crashes all the time with recent firmwares despite dev receiving crash reports. Uninstalled app.

author: Danny de Groot
comment: I can't get the weather set to the normal 'Celsius' setting... on wear it tells me to open the companion app, but that's not doing anything!?

author: kurtis krohn
comment: I'm a police officer and I bought this watch for the compass integration and my phone and car shows I'm traveling north but the watch shows I'm traveling west. Everything else works fine...is there a way to calibrate the compass?

author: Yanni Kay
comment: Downloaded it for my Huawei watch, will not appear... Huawei not referenced in your description, way to waste money for a consumer..

author: Toni Tpni
comment: Its a great apps.but since i change my smartphone ranger watch face stops workin.

author: Jason Roberts
comment: A really nice watchface, but seems to destroy the battery life on Huawei Watch 2 Sport.

author: Phil Risk
comment: Works great on Tic E but I only have options to change the night colours not the main watch colours. Help!

author: Vic Kat
comment: It does not uploaded to the watch. Useless.
